project_plan.name: Weather Fetching CLI Application in Python
project_plan.description: Build a Python program that fetches the current weather information for a given city using a public API, displaying temperature, humidity, and weather conditions in the terminal.

task.name: Implement functionality to input city name from the user
Integrate with the public weather API to fetch weather data
Parse and extract temperature, humidity, and weather conditions from the API response
Display the weather information in the terminal
Write tests for the implemented features including API calls and data handling
Execute tests on all features to ensure that they are functioning correctly
